game.name: DCS: A-10C II Operation Persian Freedom Campaign
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 캡션 이용 가능, VR 지원, 컨트롤러 일부 지원
game.shortDescription: Join Operation Persian Freedom for the A-10C Warthog and the A-10C II Tank Killer and take on the role of RAF exchange pilot Flight Lieutenant David ‘Steep’ Hill as he joins the US 74th Fighter Squadron on the eve of the invasion of Iran.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Join Operation Persian Freedom for the A-10C Warthog and the A-10C II Tank Killer and take on the role of RAF exchange pilot Flight Lieutenant David ‘Steep’ Hill as he joins the US 74th Fighter Squadron on the eve of the invasion of Iran.
